nodes.text: Tales of the Smoking Blaster was a four-part roleplaying adventure written by Bill Smith and published in the Star Wars Gamemaster Handbook in 1993. It was illustrated by Paul Daly.
A group of spacers work aboard the Loronar medium transport Smoking Blaster, making a meager living.
During one smuggling mission to the planet Cotellier with a cargo of security droid logic matrixes, they are attacked by pirates, who make off with their cargo.

They are able to limp back to Dravian Starport, where the crew of the Smoking Blaster must work to make up for the lost cargo by order of Baron Yorseg. They are then accosted by a group of Yorseg's thugs, who want to kill them for the information aboard their ship's computers. The crew is then rescued by more thugs.

Having finished repair to their ship, they make their way to Cotellier to meet with Nilya Fek'ra, who they were supposed to deliver their cargo to. They meet up with the gangster, who explains Yorgeg's actions, and invites them to join in an attack on the baron.
The crew pilots the Smoking Blaster to Yorsge's base in order to retrieve the matrixes.
